MainHeading.P: Chuaigh an Cathaoirleach i gceannas ar 3 p.m.

Speaker.hpid: Tomás Ó Maoláin Tomás Ó Maoláin
Speaker.P: As a consequence of events in another place over which I have no control, I regret that I am unable to proceed with the business on the Order Paper today and I shall ask you, a Chathaoirleach, to summon the Seanad to deal with this business as early as possible.
I wonder could the Leader of the House give any indication of what he means by “as early as possible”?

Speaker.hpid: Tomás Ó Maoláin Tomás Ó Maoláin

Speaker.P: I gather the event he is referring to is an acute shortage of Ministers and I think the House would welcome some clarification of how this House stands in this situation.

Speaker.hpid: Tomás Ó Maoláin Tomás Ó Maoláin
Speaker.P: This House, I hope, will meet next week.

Speaker.hpid: Tomás Ó Maoláin Tomás Ó Maoláin

Speaker.P: Faith without good works is dead.
The Seanad adjourned at 3.5 p.m. sine die.
